name: Flowers for Kasumi
description:
Story

Flowers for Kasumi is an RPG puzzle mystery game created by Nedras and Eredoh. It tells the story of titular girl, Kasumi, and how her life ended so abruptly. The game takes place in the fictional town of Kumashina, a small town that holds a grave secret. In the midst of fall, protagonists Isa and Omoka will unearth the secrets behind Kasumi, and the truth behind her death.

Solve puzzles and piece together the dark mystery of what happened to Kasumi Erizawa.

Meet the Protagonists

Isa Okino

   

A third-year student at Kumashina Private High School. She is very kind and known to be a "mother-like" figure. She attempts to become friends with Kasumi, before she mysteriously dies. Isa enjoys befriending others and helping them whenever they need it.

Omoka Akamine

 

A third-year student at Kumashina Private High School. She is the ex-best friend of Kasumi. Her reputation has gone down quite a lot, and she is often referred to as a delinquent. Omoka is very antisocial, but ends up forming a friendship with Isa, to try and see what became of her childhood friend, Kasumi.

Features

-Two playable protagonists 
-One single ending
-2-3 hours of gameplay
-Cutscene Graphics

We also have a development blog at:  www.flowersforkasumi-project.tumblr.com
